sentences.en: After the 2000 Olympics in Sydney China adopted a new strategy to maximise gold medals.
sentences.cn: 2000年悉尼奥运会后中国采取了新的策略以使金牌数量最大化.

sentences.en: All messages are highly optimized and encrypted to minimise cost of operation and maximise security.
sentences.cn: 高度优化和被加密的短信信息可减少运行成本和加强保密性.

sentences.en: But Mr Wang said that to maximise growth opportunities more decisive action would be needed.
sentences.cn: 但王中恺说,要想获得更大的增长机会,就必须采取更加坚决的行动.

sentences.en: Goal is to maximise the sustainability of the web of life.
sentences.cn: 目标是要使生命网的可持续能力最大化.

sentences.en: Keep lighting fixtures and lamps clean to maximise their efficiency.
sentences.cn: 经常清洁灯饰和灯泡以保持光亮度.

sentences.en: Maximise the sale of our internal outlets.
sentences.cn: 最大化内部餐厅的销售.

sentences.en: Maximise the versatility of your truck and prolong its service life with driveline equipment.
sentences.cn: 传动系统设备尽量增强卡车的通用性并延长卡车使用寿命.

sentences.en: Retailers use sophisticated systems to maximise return per square foot.
sentences.cn: 零售商们利用精密的系统来最大化每个平方英寸的回报.

sentences.en: Steps taken now to maximise your health will pay dividends later on.
sentences.cn: 现在采取措施增强体质会使你日后受益。

sentences.en: The eastern airborne holding pattern was relocated to maximise the landing rate.
sentences.cn: 重置东面扇区的空中等候区,藉此提高着陆率.

sentences.en: The warhead is set to detonate just above the target to maximise the damage.
sentences.cn: 弹头被设定正好在目标上方来引爆来获得损害最大值.

sentences.en: These facilities were structured in such a way as to maximise consistency with currency board discipline.
sentences.cn: 这些措施的设计已尽可能与货币发行局运作原则保持一致.

sentences.en: They cut costs to the bone to maximise their profits.
sentences.cn: 他们大幅度降低成本,以牟取最大利益.

sentences.en: To safeguard the interests of the JV Company and to maximise financial benefit where possible.
sentences.cn: 尽可能维护合资公司利益,为公司创造最大财务收益.

sentences.en: We will actively manage your portfolio to maximise the return on your investment.
sentences.cn: 我们会积极管理您的投资组合,使您获得最大的投资回报.

words.tran_cn: 最高的，最大的；最全面的
最高的；最多的；最大极限的
[数] 极大，最大限度；最大量
使…最大化；取…最大值（maximize的ing形式）
尽可能广义地解释；达到最大值

trans.tran_cn: 使（某事物）增至最大限度，最大限度地利用（某事物）
